headline: Coastal Names Seasoned Fintech Leader Brandon Soto as New Chief Financial Officer
summary: EVERETT, Wash., Sept. 22, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Coastal Financial Corporation (Nasdaq: CCB) (the “Company”), and its subsidiary, Coastal Community Bank (the “Bank”), today announced the appointment of Brandon Soto as Chief Financial Officer, effective October 1st, 2025. Mr. Soto joins the Bank after an impactful tenure as the Chief Financial Officer of Square Financial Services, Inc. (a subsidiary of Block, Inc.), where he played a pivotal role in building and scaling the financial operations

Mr. Soto joins the Bank after an impactful tenure as the Chief Financial Officer of Square Financial Services, Inc. (a subsidiary of Block, Inc.), where he played a pivotal role in building and scaling the financial operations
